data.title: First Look Studios
data.meta_description: First Look Studios, Inc. was an American independent film and home video distributor based in Los Angeles, California. The company specialized in the acquisition and direct distribution of, and worldwide license and sale of distribution rights to, independently produced feature films and television series.
data.text:
American film distributor / From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia
